//28-01-2004 JP SCR #5362 implement special handling for DHIC_ID
05.08.2003 RR -> SCR3193 Implemented shortcut-handling
//14-02-2003 JP SCR #2963 implement new beahvior for delelted records
//29-01-2004 JP SCR #5256 handle page up/down with var=gv.vcr_on
-- Shortcut handling
1) init program
1> if no record exist, go to create record
1> if record exist, go to online
2) online program
join program, if at least one record created so one record exist !
leave program, if no record created and no record exist
END NEW
END MODIFY
5> delete answer = yes
END DELETE
